com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.view

Class GameListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryhma6.maven.steambeater.view.GameListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class GameListController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller for the gamelist fxml Loads achievements and games and takes care of sorting and filtering
